name: Saratoga Commercial Real Estate
address: 228 E Champion St STE 102, Bellingham, WA 98225

reviews.author: steve pathfinder
reviews.review: Extremely impatient and inconsiderate in working with us. Would not recommend, Do your research and use a more reputable company.

reviews.author: Lydia Bennett
reviews.review: Whoa, Don...Not sure if you were in the right company. This definitely does not sound like the company I work with.

reviews.author: Sherryann Johnson
reviews.review: You Couldn't find better people to do business with! 9 years so far and counting.
